prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
There are a lot of troubling things going on with these activists finding willing audiences in corrupt politicians like Kathleen Wynne.  Just as they are trying to censor this brilliant and refreshing documentary on Dr. Zucker, (I'd encourage you to look into this heroic professional who was black listed by these career, taxpayer bleeding, social justice warriors and militant activists), they did the same thing with the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum.  They banned any parental feedback and deferred to the activist themselves to review it and approve it, despite the fact that it heavily promotes gender diasphora, and the fantasies of Ben Levin.

These totalitarians operate under the guise of gaining equality for a supposed marginalized group, but are willing to go scorched earth with your children to get what they want.  If you don't go along you're branded a homophobe or ignorant, but ask them for any scientific evidence and they'll trot out some junk science and personally attack you.
stories:
Many disturbing issues are emerging as activists find sympathetic ears among corrupt politicians like Kathleen Wynne. Similar to their attempts to suppress a remarkable documentary about Dr. Zucker, a courageous expert who was unfairly targeted by career-driven, taxpayer-funded social justice warriors and militant activists, they employed the same tactics with the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum. By excluding parental input and instead relying on the activists themselves for review and approval, they ensured the curriculum would heavily promote gender dysphoria and the ideologies of Ben Levin.

Under the pretence of advocating for a supposedly marginalized group, these totalitarian individuals are willing to go to extreme lengths to impose their agenda on children. Those who resist are labelled homophobic or ignorant, but when asked to provide scientific evidence, they resort to citing flawed research and personal attacks.

Corrupt politicians, such as Kathleen Wynne, are lending a sympathetic ear to activists who are pushing for radical changes. This is reminiscent of their efforts to censor a documentary about Dr. Zucker, a brave expert who was unfairly targeted by self-serving, publicly-funded activists. Similarly, they manipulated the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum by excluding parental involvement and instead relying on the activists themselves to review and approve the content, resulting in a curriculum that heavily promotes gender dysphoria and the ideologies of Ben Levin.

Under the guise of advocating for a minority group, these authoritarian individuals will stop at nothing to force their agenda on children. Those who oppose them are quickly labelled as homophobic or ignorant, but when challenged to provide scientific proof, they resort to citing questionable research and launching personal attacks.

Politicians with questionable integrity, such as Kathleen Wynne, are providing a receptive audience to activists seeking drastic reforms. This echoes their previous attempts to suppress a documentary about Dr. Zucker, a courageous expert who was unfairly maligned by self-interested, taxpayer-funded activists. In a similar vein, they manipulated the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum by excluding parental input and instead relying on activists to review and approve the content, resulting in a curriculum that heavily emphasizes gender dysphoria and the ideologies of Ben Levin.

Under the pretense of promoting the welfare of a minority group, these authoritarian figures will go to great lengths to impose their ideology on children. Those who dare to oppose them are quickly branded as homophobic or uninformed, but when pressed to provide empirical evidence, they resort to citing dubious research and launching personal attacks.

Politicians of dubious character, like Kathleen Wynne, are lending a sympathetic ear to activists pushing for radical changes. This mirrors their past efforts to silence a documentary about Dr. Zucker, a brave expert who was unjustly smeared by self-serving, taxpayer-funded activists. Similarly, they hijacked the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum by dismissing parental input and instead relying on activists to review and approve the content, yielding a curriculum that disproportionately focuses on gender dysphoria and the ideologies of Ben Levin.

Under the guise of promoting the well-being of a marginalized group, these authoritarian figures will stop at nothing to force-feed their ideology to children. Those who dare challenge them are swiftly labeled as homophobic or ignorant, but when asked to provide concrete evidence, they fall back on citing questionable research and launching personal attacks.

Unscrupulous politicians, such as Kathleen Wynne, are showing undue sympathy to activists advocating for extreme reforms. This echoes their previous attempts to suppress a documentary about Dr. Zucker, a courageous expert who was unfairly maligned by self-interested, publicly funded activists. In a similar vein, they commandeered the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum by disregarding parental feedback and instead relying on activists to review and endorse the content, resulting in a curriculum that disproportionately emphasizes gender dysphoria and the ideologies of Ben Levin.

Under the pretense of promoting the welfare of a vulnerable group, these authoritarian figures will go to great lengths to impose their ideology on children. Those who dare to question them are quickly branded as homophobic or uninformed, but when pressed for concrete evidence, they resort to citing dubious research and launching personal attacks.

Similarly, they hijacked the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum by ignoring parental input and instead relying on activists to vet and approve the content, leading to a curriculum that places undue emphasis on gender dysphoria and the ideologies of Ben Levin.

This echoes their past efforts to censor a documentary about Dr. Zucker, a brave expert who was unfairly targeted by activists motivated by financial gain and backed by government funding. Similarly, they seized control of Ontario's Sex Ed curriculum, ignoring parental input and instead relying on feedback from activists to shape and approve the content, resulting in a curriculum that overly focuses on gender identity issues and the views of Ben Levin.
